data.message: Implemented V6 UI States (loading, empty, error): Created 3 state components: SkeletonCard (with SkeletonCardGrid), EmptyState (no-results, no-matches variants), ErrorState (connection, server variants). Demo page at localhost:3003/home-v6/states. Follows Design Study Pack requirement for state coverage.
